name: fuckyoufriday
text: I'm not sure why, but this one slays me. I think their facial expressions are key. Great punchline too.

name: epicurus
text: The facial expressions are indeed crucial.

text: this is my favorite one ever

name: rowboat
text: It lacks conviction. You gotta earn your lames around here, boy. That is, if your name isn't asherdan, catachresis, Dr. Manflesh or retardo. Those dudes get lamed even if they don't comment. They are raw.

name: saint
text:
you should look at some more of my posts.
although, right now, about a quarter of my inbox is from you, so I get the feeling you already do.

are you stalking me?

name: slalvation
text: HOLY FUCK, THERE'S AN INBOX.

name: rowboat
text: I want to be you, saint.

name: johnnyrocker
text: you're going to wear his skin, aren't you

name: rowboat
text: Huh? What'd you say? I can't hear you through saint's skin.

name: buttermoths
text: Voice all muffled, trying to speak through saint's taint

name: soticoto
text: A comment left by soticoto was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by prolefeed5, sandswipe, Doc_Rostov, VictoriaW)

name: steerpike66
text: I like dogs and I still think that this is how they talk. they are smelly, ass-chewing, ball-licking, stick-chasing dorks. That's why we like them.

name: shirt145
text:
Yeah I like how in the talking-animal universe where cats can wear thongs and drive Escalades, dogs are still too dumb to say anything of value.

Otters, though, those cats are hell of cute.

name: jonmw
text: A comment left by jonmw was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by glorify, rooster, Gigs, AJESTERONLY, mistlethrush, Ravigotte)

name: ravigotte
text: I'd say shout your memes elsewhere.

name: layzerblade
text: Chubbied to offset some undeserved lames. Your quotation of an amusing meme did not make me lol but does not deserve censure.

name: zem
text: myor momation mo ma mamusin meme mwuh mwuh mwuh mwuh mwuh

name: layzerblade
text: For this, I close my robe?

name: vulpes-aurum
text: Osterdan must not be a dog lover. I don't think I've seen a single canine in any of the panels, yet.

name: rowboat
text: LOOK HARDER .

name: vulpes-aurum
text: Ohh shiiiiiiiit , I completely forgot about those.

name: rowboat
text: Don't. Don't forget about those.

name: vulpes-aurum
text:
I'm sorry. As a token of my apology, I bequeath thee with this:

[IMGS OFF]

name: rowboat
text: Accepted. With a keenness.

name: vulpes-aurum
text:
Commander Keen-ness?

[IMGS OFF]

name: waddlerz
text: You get lamed by dog lovers who read a comic strip that only portrays stuffed animals and cats, irony?

name: thommy_h
text: I love Molly and Beef's relationship. It's great how they understand each other enough to have a conversation like this and both totally get what the other one is saying.

name: sneechles
text: agreed... their love is so pure

name: theryuujin
text: Totally redeemed Molly after trying to shut down Beef's rant last strip.  I was getting nervous.

name: equinn2006
text: I do love dogs, but they are pretty dumb. Like this.

name: nurdbot
text: A comment left by nurdbot was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ohmygooses, cailetshadow, SenseiHollywood)

name: johnnyrocker
text: Magreaux?

name: epicurus
text: This is a great strip because it captures the type of moments I have had in some of my relationships where we can do this sort of thing, totally spoof the world  together with no pants on. It is a good thing, too rare.

name: bourbonsamurai
text: That is epic-true, epicurus. That is the sign of a good relationship.

name: wae
text: Your comment makes me a little wistful. The thought of puked-up tennis ball pieces makes sure that I don't get too wistful.

name: waldo913
text:
Forsooth. I envy beef for this.

Also, how creepy is it that I find Molly kind of hot after reading this strip?

name: saru
text:
Our genetic imperative may force us to seek out a "healthy" mate, but our minds want someone to join us. The communion of mind to mind is far hotter and more holy than the wet sticky mess of sexiness.

(Before I'm misinterpreted, I quite enjoy the wet sticky mess too.)

name: farqussus
text: Dang it, you're right. I think I should ring my ex-girlfriend.

name: freerhi
text: dont do it man! she has simon now

name: farqussus
text: he'll never get her like i did

name: johnnyrocker
text: chubby for "simon"

name: johnnyrocker
text: chubby for "simon"

name: fineoakstructure
text: Chubby for "Simon & Simon".  I loved that show as a kid.

name: hellofyellin
text:
This comic made me buckle over. I still get a chuckle from it. Also, I think that this is what love is.

Go Beef.

name: darkwaffle
text: this is a strip that made a lot of sense to me

text: OH REALLY? IN THE SAME PLACE OR WHAT

text: MAYBE A FEW INCHES TO THE LEFT, I DON'T KNOW

text: I PICKED UP A STICK AND THEN ATE IT!

name: aelindil
text: IT WAS HUGE!

name: rowboat
text: YOUR ASS SMELLS INTERESTING TODAY WOULD YOU LIKE TO TRY MINE

name: catgrl131
text: MMM THAT'S PRETTY GOOD STUFF. LIGHT AND REFRESHING, YET FULL-BODIED, WITH AN OAKY AFTERTASTE. WHAT DO YOU RECOMMEND TO GO WITH THIS ASS?

name: untilyouaresonude
text:
These two are made for each other.

i guess...yeah, that's literally what happened.

name: zapatos
text: Its a match made in heaven.

name: steerpike66
text: I like it best in panel 4 where ty're waving their arms about in that feckless, flappy, canine manner. 'Ain't that the truth?' is definitely the sort of dumbass thing that dogs bark at each other.

name: cousinted
text:
Song cue: "Animals" -Talking Heads

They wander around like a crazy dog
Make a mistake in the parking lot
Always bumping into things
Always let you down down down down.

name: lrosetw8
text: Hey, they got a better lamp.

name: merkin579
text: They had the new lamp on 7/15/04

name: the_stoned_one
text:
Beefs upgraded his lamp!
GO BEEF!
no more pepsi cans for you dude

name: eraia
text: I hope that wasn't Ray's Pepsi can...

name: apmihal
text: The line "IT MADE A LOT OF SENSE TO ME" just shows Onstad's genius. It's funny in a way that is really just too complex to explain without, like, a wikipedia page for it or something.

name: saru
text:
I was smiling gently to myself over this strip, when all unaccounted a corny phrase started to pop into my head:
"Awww, it's a match made in hea-"
....
I sat with my head in my hands for probably quite a few moments.
I fived it for the perfect pun.
The deep soulful longing for their love, as well as the piercing insight into the true nature of love, helped too.

name: cpnglxynchos
text:
this comment makes me wonder how many times i've thought the same thing and never caught myself doing it.

chubbied for this fact.

name: xiaomimi
text:
Today's Blogs

Ray: I found an old childhood game

name: charchar
text:
My dog once ate the plaster off the wall.

But my cat recently ate my sweatpants, so I am not sure which species is the superior one. Maybe it's just me.

name: redmange
text: The difference is that your dog ate plaster because it is a dumbass.  Your cat ate your sweatpants because they were hella lame.

name: charchar
text: They were glorious.

name: johnnybaverage
text: It's all in the motive.

name: mattylite
text: Awwwwwwwwwwww...

name: unsentletter
text: A comment left by unsentletter was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by straw, rascaldom, ghoti)

name: trollcollins
text:
I had never noticed before, but Molly kind of leads this conversation; Beef, who often innovates and dictates the direction of similar interactions with such as Ray, is in the passenger seat somewhat here.

That's cool. We don't see enough of Molly. Here is an example of why.

name: cryztal
text:
This strip reminds me of a time some ex-boyfriend's uncle told me that dogs have a language that consists of one word, and that word is "HEY!"

Since then, whenever I hear dogs barking, that's all I hear. "HEY! HEY! HEEEEEEY!!!!"

name: lucidloon
text: Wasn't that a Far Side strip?

name: cryztal
text:
Uncle could have read it in a Far Side strip.

All I nows is that that's where I heard it from.

name: fattypneumonia
text:
This reminds me precisely of a Dexter's Lab short, where he invents a device to allow a stray dog to speak in English. Dog's dumber than a sack o' wet mice.

Link to video (talkin' dog bit starts around 4:00) - http://bit.ly/TL9Sa

name: singtralala
text: best pillow talk ever

name: ketelcat
text: This is so brilliant =D fourth panel cracks me up! With the arms and whatnot

name: zapatos
text: I very much enjoy the  Molly x Beef bedtime stories.

name: peecat
text:
I want me a Roastbeef to Molly with. Double sweet!

Plus - they are so right. Dogs yell, they don't talk like cats. Dogs are the retarded jocks of the animal world.

name: furge
text: Exactly the moment it became inevitable they would marry each other.

name: 21echoes
text: as i read this, three dogs are discussing the latest excrements of their communal neighbor outside my window.

name: fattypneumonia
text: Best alt text ever.

name: samspud
text: I have never liked dogs. I have always thought them to be disgusting animals drooling and pooping all over the place. Plus they always want to be in my personal space, even some dogs who "never do that." Sorry dog lovers! 5'd.

name: fineoakstructure
text:
That's ok.

Check it out, I like dogs and don't really like cats all that much but I'm not laming this guy just because he doesn't like dogs!

Now how about some of you cat-lovin' jack offs exercise some of the same restraint through the rest of assetbar?

name: griffypoo
text: Cat lovers tend to be a lot like Mac lovers, I've noticed. Take any chance at all to drone on about how adorable their little furball is and/or post pictures of it sleeping on their keyboard, or sleeping on the TV, or sleeping on the couch, or sleeping on the floor, or sleeping...you get the idea. Take every chance to relay the evils of dog ownership, how disgusting and stupid dogs can be, all while refusing to acknowledge that their little baby can and will do the exact same shit. I'm gonna get a fucking huge dog when I get back to the states, if for no other reason than that it could eat most of my body if I die inside the house someday, leaving one hell of a scene for whoever finds it. Let's see your pansy-ass cat do that !
